abs: This short overview is an addendum to a recent literature survey by Bianchi et al. on metaheuristics for stochastic combinatorial optimization (SCO). It outlines some new developments that occurred in this field during the last few years. Special attention is given to multi-objective SCO as well as to combinations of metaheuristics with mathematical programming.
title: Recent trends in metaheuristics for stochastic combinatorial optimization
names: Central European Journal of Computer Science
